Total Cost of Revenue: cost of goods and services sold

Income Before Taxes: income loss from continuing operations before income taxes extraordinary items noncontrolling interest

Interest Income: investment income interest dividend and other
Other Income (Expense): gain loss on derivative instruments net pretax
income loss from equity method investments
other than temporary impairment losses investments portion recognized in earnings net

Other Operating Expenses: liability for unpaid claims and claims adjustment expense incurred claims1
policyholder benefits and claims incurred life and annuity
policyholder benefits and claims incurred net

Weighted Average Shares Outstanding (Bas: weighted average number of shares outstanding basic

Total Revenues: operating leases income statement lease revenue
revenue from contract with customer excluding assessed tax

__unmapped__: cargo and freight revenue and regulated and unregulated operating revenue
costs of services and operating expenses
interest expense and foreign currency transaction gain loss on debt
net income loss attributable to noncontrolling interest
income loss from continuing operations before income taxes minority interest and income loss from equity method investments
